title: Daily Hope With Pastor Rick Warren - 45 Sermons
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------
DAILY HOPE WITH PASTOR RICK WARREN - 45 SERMONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

Everyone needs hope.  Daily Hope with Rick Warren shares a meaningful message from Scripture, practical and applicable, to encourage, equip and train people to fulfill GodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s purposes for their life. 

Today's torrent contains 45 bible inspired sermons preached during the 2013 calendar year.  Each sermon is about 25 minutes long.  Details of all 45 topics include...

 * 2013 - Set Free From Me - Part 1

And while you're at it, if you haven't already, be sure to check out some of my other Sermon Packages found here on The Pirate Bay.  To date there are 17 packages to choose from (accounting for 747 sermons in total) including...

For His Glory,
